text: I feel a bit tired today but I can manage to finish my tasks.
If I don't get this promotion, my entire career is over and I'll be destitute.
He didn't say hello to me in the hallway, so he definitely hates me.
I made a mistake on the report. I am completely useless at everything I do.
I feel anxious about the upcoming trip, which is a normal reaction to travel.
I felt a strange pain in my arm, I am surely having a stroke right now.
It's all my fault that it rained during the picnic, I should have chosen a different day.
I should never make mistakes, otherwise I am weak and undisciplined.
I am sad about the bad news, but I know I will recover in time.
Nothing good ever happens to me, I am just unlucky.
